name: hail2u.net
description: The source files of Hail2u (https://hail2u.net/) website
author: Kyo Nagashima <hail2u@gmail.com> (https://hail2u.net/)

scripts.postarticle: npm run feed && npm run html -- --latest && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postbook: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.css: node bin/css.js && node bin/style-guide.js && cp --recursive src/css/. dist/css/
scripts.deploy: cd dist/ && git add --all && git diff --cached --exit-code --quiet || git commit --message Build && git push origin gh-pages
scripts.img: node bin/img.js && cp --recursive src/img/. dist/img/ && cp src/img/icon.svg dist/favicon.svg
scripts.postlink: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.poststatus: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.postsubscription: npm run feed && npm run html && npm run deploy && git switch -
scripts.test: stylelint src/css/ && eslint bin/ lib/ src/js/
scripts.preversion: git switch upnext && npm audit && npm test && git rebase main && git switch main && git merge --ff-only upnext
scripts.version: npm run css && npm run feed && npm run html -- --all && npm run img && node bin/feed-validator.js && node bin/html-validator.js
scripts.postversion: git push origin main --tags && git switch upnext && git rebase main
